entry.title: Docs update | RoboDriver online documentation is live
entry.summary: The official RoboDriver-Doc site is now live! It covers quickstart, robot integration guides, architecture deep dives, and contributor docs to help you connect robots and iterate faster.
entry.content:
The official RoboDriver-Doc site is now live! It covers quickstart, robot integration guides, architecture deep dives, and contributor docs to help you connect robots and iterate faster.

-Visit: https://flagopen.github.io/RoboDriver-Doc

Highlights:

  • Structured overview of RoboDriver core features and integration flows
  • Step-by-step tutorials for ROS1/ROS2/Dora integrations
  • Robot adapter specs, contribution guide, and FAQs
  • Bilingual (Chinese/English) toggle for international teams

entry.title: Open source | RoboDriver is now public!
entry.summary: RoboDriver, DataCollect's core driver layer and the standardized robot access module for the CoRobot data stack, is now open source! It supports multiple robot integration modes and remains compatible with the LeRobot ecosystem.
entry.content: RoboDriver, DataCollect's core driver layer and the standardized robot access module for the CoRobot data stack, is now open source! It supports multiple robot integration modes and remains compatible with the LeRobot ecosystem.

entry.title: New integration | GALAXEALITE dual-arm ROS2 adapter released
entry.summary: RoboDriver has a new ROS2 integration! The GALAXEALITE dual-arm robot adapter repo is now live, supporting dual 6-DOF + gripper control, with four RealSense camera streams and LeRobot-style interfaces.
entry.content:
RoboDriver has a new ROS2 integration! The GALAXEALITE dual-arm robot adapter repo is now live, supporting dual 6-DOF + gripper control, with four RealSense camera streams and LeRobot-style interfaces.

The GALAXEALITE adapter includes end-to-end setup, config changes, and capture/control validation so you can deploy directly: Link: robodriver-robot-galaxealite-aio-ros2

Highlights:

  • Dual-arm coordinated motion and single-arm independent operation
  • Synchronized multi-camera capture, aligned with the extended LeRobot dataset format
  • ROS2 node configuration examples and comms debugging tools

entry.title: Release | RoboDriver v0.2.0 with lerobot compatibility
Ecosystem Update | SO101 open-source arm Dora adapter released
entry.summary: RoboDriver's Dora ecosystem has a new member! The SO101 open-source lightweight arm adapter repo is live, supporting 6-DOF plus gripper control, with dual RealSense depth + RGB capture, fully compatible with RoboDriver's device driver and data pipelines.
entry.content:
RoboDriver's Dora ecosystem has a new member! The SO101 open-source lightweight arm adapter repo is live, supporting 6-DOF plus gripper control, with dual RealSense depth + RGB capture, fully compatible with RoboDriver's device driver and data pipelines.

The SO101 Dora adapter offers an out-of-the-box guide so you can connect and start collecting quickly: Link: robodriver-robot-so101-aio-dora

Highlights:

  • Low-latency command and data transport built on Dora
  • Per-sample storage and editing, aligned with the extended LeRobot dataset format
  • Sample extensions and docs for open-source arm secondary development
